display_long_description:
Lost & Scared is a fangame of Gorilla Tag, which throws players into the chilling area of an abandoned hospital. It will send shivers down your spine because this game combined fast movement taken from Gorilla Tag and a horror environment that is full of tension and mystery.

From the dark corridors to the broken rooms and eerie operating theaters, every little shadow or creaking sound can make you envision hidden danger-or something infinitely worse. Whether with a group of friends or going solo, teamwork and quick reflexes are your best survival tools.

It is a game that combines ambient sound design with creepy visuals, using some really interesting goals: puzzle-solving, fleeing from threats, finding the darker secrets of the past.

Blending the dynamic gameplay of Gorilla Tag with an impressively deep-horror atmosphere, Lost & Scared promises its fans a heart-jumping experience in VR gameplay combined with a high level of psychological intensity. Will you leave alive, or will you live on in eternity, lost and scared?
